name: Traefik (Prometheus)
description: This quickstart was built and tested based on Traefik metrics sent to New Relic using Prometheus Agent or Prometheus server

rawConfiguration.text:
![New Relic logo](https://i.imgur.com/gQaFo7i.png) 
- - -
### Overview
`Traefik` (pronounced *traffic*) is a modern HTTP reverse proxy and load balancer that makes deploying microservices easy.

### About this Dashboard

This dashboard is based on standard `traefik` Prometheus metrics ingested using Prometheus [remote write](https://newrelic.com/instant-observability/prometheus-remote-write/7dbd7355-c380-4211-bd32-fed9a65351af).  Most widgets utilize an `instance` facet to identify `traefik` instances in the cluster.

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
max(traefik_config_last_reload_success)*1000 AS 'Last Reload Success',
max(traefik_config_last_reload_failure)*1000 AS 'Last Reload Failure',
sum(traefik_config_reloads_total) AS 'Total Reloads',
sum(traefik_config_reloads_failure_total) AS 'Total Failed Reloads'
FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance) AS 'Instance'
LIMIT MAX
WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( {{prometheus_server}}) AND instance IN ( {{instance}} )

FROM Metric SELECT
sum(traefik_entrypoint_requests_total) AS 'Total Requests'
FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance) AS 'Instance', entrypoint
LIMIT MAX
WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( {{prometheus_server}}) AND instance IN ( {{instance}} )

FROM Metric SELECT
latest(traefik_entrypoint_open_connections) AS 'Open Connections'
FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance) AS 'Instance', entrypoint
WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( {{prometheus_server}}) AND instance IN ( {{instance}} )
TIMESERIES
LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
latest(traefik_entrypoint_open_connections) AS 'Open Connections',
sum(traefik_entrypoint_requests_total) AS 'Total Requests',
sum(traefik_entrypoint_requests_tls_total) AS 'Total TLS Requests',
bucketPercentile(traefik_entrypoint_request_duration_seconds_bucket, 95) AS 'Request Duration (ms)',
average(traefik_entrypoint_request_duration_seconds_sum) AS 'Average Request Duration (ms)'
FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance) AS 'Instance', entrypoint, method, protocol
LIMIT MAX
WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( {{prometheus_server}}) AND instance IN ( {{instance}} )

FROM Metric SELECT
sum(traefik_service_requests_total) AS 'Total Requests'
FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance) AS 'Instance', service
LIMIT MAX
WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( {{prometheus_server}}) AND instance IN ( {{instance}} )

FROM Metric SELECT count(traefik_service_requests_total) AS 'Total Requests' FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance) AS 'Instance', service, code WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( {{prometheus_server}}) AND instance IN ( {{instance}} ) LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT
average(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_sum) AS 'Average Request Duration (ms)'
FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance) AS 'Instance', service
LIMIT MAX
WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( {{prometheus_server}}) AND instance IN ( {{instance}} )

FROM Metric SELECT
latest(traefik_service_open_connections) AS 'Open Connections',
sum(traefik_service_requests_total) AS 'Total Requests',
sum(traefik_service_requests_tls_total) AS 'Total TLS Requests',
bucketPercentile(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_bucket, 95) AS 'Request Duration (ms)',
average(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_sum) AS 'Average Request Duration (ms)'
FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance) AS 'Instance', service, method, protocol
LIMIT MAX
WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( {{prometheus_server}}) AND instance IN ( {{instance}} )

FROM Metric SELECT
latest(traefik_tls_certs_not_after)*1000 AS 'Expiration Date'
FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance) AS 'Instance', cn AS 'Common Name', sans AS 'Subject Alternate Name', serial
LIMIT MAX
WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( {{prometheus_server}}) AND instance IN ( {{instance}} )

nrqlQuery.query: FROM Metric SELECT uniques(prometheus_server) WHERE instrumentation.name='remote-write' and metricName LIKE 'traefik%' since 1 week ago
FROM Metric SELECT uniques(instance) WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND metricName LIKE 'traefik%' since 1 week ago
